says: I'd be happy to help you find the next course dates in your area.
Could you please select which best describes you?

reply.question: I know which course I want to take.
I don't know which course suits my needs.

says: Thank you. Were you looking to take a online, hybrid, or in-person course?
In our in-person classes, participants learn all in the information they need to know for their certification in the classroom, no pre-studying required.
Our hybrid classes require participants to first complete a set of self-lead videos through our online portal before coming to class in-person for a skills assessment.
Hybrid programs may offer more flexibility as the videos can be completed at any time 6 weeks before the skills assessment, and participants often spend less time in the classroom.
Lastly, virtual classes are limited to a few topics and are completed entirely online.
That being said, which course format were you interested in?
